definition: to go through/to know well/(suffix) expert/to connect/to communicate/open/to clear/classifier for letters, telegrams, phone calls etc
classifier for an activity, taken in its entirety (tirade of abuse, stint of music playing, bout of drinking etc)
letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
to guard/to protect/to defend/abbr. for 衛生|卫生, hygiene/health/abbr. for 衛生間|卫生间, toilet
surname Wei/vassal state during the Zhou Dynasty (1066-221 BC), located in present day Henan and Hebei Provinces

sentences.english: The television programmes from all over the world are bounced off satellites.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的电视节目都由通信卫星转播。

sentences.english: The Intelsat IV communications satellite goes into commercial operation.
sentences.chinese: 国际卫星六号通信卫星投入商业使用。

sentences.english: Both have also contracted with outside companies to build telecom satellites and provide launch services.
sentences.chinese: 两国都与外部公司签约建立通信卫星并提供发射服务。

sentences.english: Transistors replaced the old vacuum tubes, and by the 1960s communications satellites eliminated the necessity of landlines.
sentences.chinese: 到了60年代，通信卫星又消除了对地面线路的需要。

sentences.english: The most common use of telecommunication satellites, however, has been for transmitting telephone calls.
sentences.chinese: 然而，通信卫星最普遍的用途是传送电话。

pinyin: wei4 xing1 dao3 hang2 xi4 tong3

definition: Globalnaya Navigatsionaya Satelinaya Sistema or Global Navigation Satellite System (GLONASS), the Russian equivalent of GPS/abbr. to 格洛納斯|格洛纳斯
pinyin: quan2 qiu2 wei4 xing1 dao3 hang2 xi4 tong3

definition: BeiDou Navigation Satellite System (BDS) (similar to GPS)
pinyin: Bei3 Dou3 Wei4 xing1 Dao3 hang2 Xi4 tong3

definition: to shoot (a projectile)/to fire (a rocket)/to launch/to emit (a particle)/to discharge/emanation/emission
